class.description: Filler behavior for testing the functionality of dhtts
Behavior to move the robot through a ros1 bridge
Behavior to command a robot to pick an object over a ros1 bridge
Behavior to command a robot to place an object over a ros1 bridge

Task node which can only be the topmost node in the tree. A tree can only have one root. The root node's job is to manage the resources of the robot and to begin the activation cycle of the tree. The root node also acts as the major connect with the main server control services.
Task node which executes all of its children in an undefined order.
Task node which executes one of its children and then stops.
Task node which executes children in the order specified when the children are added to the tree.
GOiTR meant just for testing the functionality of the communication with the mainserver etc.
GOiTR meant for controlling a subtree that finds objects in a list of known locations in the environment.
